short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official DrawLink Chrome Extension. Create beautiful cards for any link, image, or current page.
short.zh_CN: DrawLink官方Chrome扩展。为任何链接、图片或当前页面创建精美的卡片。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DrawLink transforms ordinary URLs into captivating visual stories. In a world where content competes for attention, we've reimagined how links are shared, experienced, and remembered. This isn't just about making links beautiful — it's about making your content impossible to ignore.
long.zh_CN: DrawLink 能将普通的网址转化为令人印象深刻的视觉故事。在这个内容竞争激烈的世界里，我们重新构想了链接的分享、体验和记忆方式。这不仅仅是让链接更美观，更是让你的内容无法被忽视。
